original_text: If a man lies with a woman and has an emission of semen, both of them shall bathe themselves in water and be unclean until the evening.
korean_text: 남녀가 동침하여 설정하였거든 둘 다 물로 몸을 씻을 것이며 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: If a man lies with a woman
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 남자가 여인과 함께 누우면

sentences.original_text: and has an emission of semen
both of them shall bathe themselves in water
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 둘 다 물로 몸을 씻어야 하며

sentences.original_text: and be unclean until the evening.
